content: Once you've beaten him, be sure to collect the Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai Spirit that he leaves behind.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've beaten him, be sure to collect the Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai Spirit that he leaves behind.
